title: Executive Order 7877-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6814, Dated August 9, 1934, and Executive Order No. 6895-A, Dated November 2, 1934
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the Silver Purchase Act of 1934 and of all other authority vested in me, Executive Order No. 6814, dated August 9, 1934, and Executive Order No. 6895-A, dated November 2, 1934, are hereby revoked. The revocation of said Executive orders shall not affect any act done, or any right accruing or accrued, or any suit or proceeding had or commenced in any civil or criminal cause prior to this revocation, and all penalties, forfeitures and liabilities under said Executive orders shall continue and may be enforced as if said revocation had not been made.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7877-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6814, Dated August 9, 1934, and Executive Order No. 6895-A, Dated November 2, 1934 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368750
